div.p: A required child element of physDescStructured that indicates the type of unit being quantified, e.g., boxes, linear feet, megabyte, gigabyte, etc.

Required in physDescStructured, unitType identifies the type of unit being quantified. This can cover analog types such as boxes, linear feet or meters, cubic meters, etc. as well as digital types such as megabytes, gigabytes, etc. or types of items that are counted such as maps, photographs, posters, etc.

list.item: Use valueURI to provide a number, code, or string (e.g., URI) that uniquely identifies the unit type in a controlled vocabulary, taxonomy, ontology, or other knowledge organization system. Use vocabularySource and/or vocabularySourceURI to name and/or point to the organization system used.
Use conventionDeclarationReference to point to a conventionDeclaration in control that specifies the descriptive rules followed for forming the unit type.
